data.comment: The match is underway in Gwangju.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 10, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kim Min-hyeok returns to the field for Sangju Sangmu after picking up a slight injury.
Kim Min-hyeok is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Gwangju at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Felipe Silva of Gwangju smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
In the minute 15, Sangju Sangmu needs to be cautious. Gwangju have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Gwangju.
Kwon Kyung-won is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Gwangju.
Sangju Sangmu's Kwon Kyung-won looks ok and returns to the pitch.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
In the minute 22, Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
Jeong Jae-Hee (Sangju Sangmu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 24, Sangju Sangmu pushes forward through Jeong Jae-Hee, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sangju Sangmu are whistled for offside.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Im Min-hyeok (Gwangju) has received a first yellow card.
Sangju Sangmu will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gwangju.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gwangju.
In the minute 32, Gwangju are caught offside.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Gwangju to check on Im Min-hyeok, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
In the minute 39, Im Min-hyeok, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Kim Ju-kong is the substitute for Gwangju.
Throw-in Gwangju.
In the minute 41, Yeo Reum (Gwangju) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lee Dong-su hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Sangju Sangmu!
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
In the minute 45, Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
Park Yong-woo of Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
In the minute 45, Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 45, Sang-Hyeop Chae will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
Hong Jun-ho (Gwangju) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Kim Tae-wan (Sangju Sangmu) is making a first substitution, with Ju-Sung Woo replacing Kwon Kyung-won.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 51, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Kim Min-hyeok for Sangju Sangmu has been booked by Sang-Hyeop Chae and receives a first yellow card.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Gwangju throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Gwangju's Kim Ju-kong breaks free at Gwangju World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Gwangju a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Gwangju make their second substitution with Kim Hyo-gi replacing Du Hyeon-seok.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
The away team replace Kim Min-hyeok with Moon Chang-jin.
In the minute 59, Gwangju to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 63, In Gwangju Sangju Sangmu attack through Seon-min Moon. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Gwangju.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 67, In Gwangju, Park Yong-woo of Sangju Sangmu is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in high up the field for Sangju Sangmu in Gwangju.
Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 70, Gwangju advance rapidly upfield but Sang-Hyeop Chae blows for offside.
In Gwangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lee Sang-ki (Sangju Sangmu) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 72, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gwangju.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 75, Gwangju's Felipe Silva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Gwangju are coming forward and Felipe Silva gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 76, Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Sangju Sangmu's Seon-min Moon misses with an attempt on goal.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 81, Sang-Hyeop Chae awards the away team a throw-in.
Marcos Urena is replacing Eom Won-sang for the home team.
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Sangju Sangmu's area.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Sang-Hyeop Chae.
In the minute 85, Felipe Silva (Gwangju) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Sang-Hyeop Chae awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Lee Keun-ho is replacing Lee Dong-su for Sangju Sangmu at Gwangju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 87, Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Sangju Sangmu are pushing forward but Jeong Jae-Hee's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
In the minute 89, Free kick Gwangju.
Marcos Urena for Gwangju gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sangju Sangmu have a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
Sang-Hyeop Chae signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
Jeong Jae-Hee puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Lee Keun-ho.
Lee Keun-ho is booked for the away team.
